DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Identifier Domain Histology Comment Specify

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A domain that represents the data that uniquely identifies tumors._The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains._A written explanation, observation or criticism added to textual material.
